fields.name: ​
fields.value:
I'm broken, but I am made whole again

It's hard to tell where my flesh begins and ends

I know, I know it's so good to be alive

Man-made machines helped me to revive

I'm broken, but I am made whole again

It's hard to tell where my flesh begins and ends

I know, I know it's so good to be alive

Man-made machines helped me to revive

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
Wired artificial heart

Fitted with all new parts

Mechanized prosthetic limbs

Scars littered across the skin

They replaced all my guts

I am held by bolts and nuts

My robotic plastic eyes

My brain is computerized

fields.name: ​
fields.value:
Took my time to make sure I rehabilitate

Beat the slurred speech, learned to walk straight

I know, I know, even now, I still have some worth

Man-made machines guided me to rebirth

Took my time to make sure I rehabilitate

Beat the slurred speech, learned to walk straight

I know, I know, even now, I still have some worth

Man-made machines guided me to rebirth
